memo.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a short official note to another person in the same company or organization
memo.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I sent him a memo reminding him about the meeting.
a memo from the managing director to all heads of department
memo.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a short official note, usually from one person to another person or group of people in the same company or organization
memo.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: A memo was sent to all employees informing them of the merger deal.
